course.subject: LANG
course.name: English for University Studies II
course.description: The course builds on LANG 1002 and aims to further develop students' proficiency in English as well as their academic literacy skills, so that they can cope with the linguistic demands of studying through the medium of English. The course aims to develop students' competence in reading and writing, as well as the ability to engage in oral interaction in social and academic contexts. For students under the four-year degree curriculum.
course.exclusions: IELTS - Band 7 or above in overall and Band 6.5 or above in each part of the test or equivalent

reviews.author: Tungc
reviews.comment_content: Rubbish. Don't have the any details about the assessment. The content is meaningless. learn nothing after studying this course.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Teaching is a rubbishhhhhhhhhhhh.
Stay in the breakout room all the time and do meaningless things.
Having no time to talk about the assessment.
reviews.comment_workload:
Very large workload. Need to do group project. The project include a video about different topic like digital divide , Robot teacher and digital nomad.
My group mate are all free rider. I handle everything and they do nothing. Like a disasterrrr.

reviews.author: twy63
reviews.title: 邊個話I班一定唔可以入A range
reviews.comment_teaching: 認住Bruce Ma，你好彩簡到佢你已經成功左一半，每次要做嘅assignment都會好明確咁話你聽個要求同佢個評分準則，你跟足就基本上4分out of 5 each critiria。Bruce Ma係個好有heart嘅老師，睇得出係真心想教英文，我真系無收佢錢，Bruce Ma世一！！！
reviews.comment_grading:
academic blog 1 ：16.5/20
academic blog 2 ：20/25
storyboard sharing: 5/5
Multimodal project:24.5/30
3份reflective tasks: 3-3.5
SDL做齊
Final grade：A- (leng grade for me）

reviews.author: billy123
reviews.comment_content:
同以往嘅唔同,冇考試
3 unit + Elective 4 選 2
內容全部圍繞Multimodal project  (U1 team skills+library skills, U2搵番呢啲資料點樣用落去Multimodal project, U3 present skill)

上堂主要聽佢講完power point 就會分組做野(都係一路吹水一路做)
reviews.comment_teaching:
都幾好人, 唔係淨係佢講,會問問題,都叫做有互動。
上堂前會播下歌。
問佢問題佢好詳細咁解答。
reviews.comment_grading:
A range ，靚grade (前提交齊功課,齊出席率)
分組入面四個人全部A
70%Multimodal project(包埋Academic Blog *2+Reflection Task *3 )
-5%storyboard (power point present 條片嘅計劃 )
-25%片
-5%present+Q and A

30% self-directed learning(Elective 4 選 2 +Online reading assignments * 6)
reviews.comment_workload:
Online reading assignments * 6
Academic Blog *2
Elective 4 選 2
Multimodal project (整一條6-8分鐘嘅片) (佔分最多)
Reflection Task *3 (2篇600字嘅文+一條三分鐘嘅片)
都幾大,如果每個禮拜都有做啲,就會好啲,如果唔係累積到最後有機會真係會出事。
建議:主動去識多啲人,搵啲可靠嘅組員,成個project輕鬆好多
#好彩搵到啲做嘢嘅人,一路吹水一路做都還算輕鬆

reviews.author: Nonely
reviews.comment_content: 當佢唔係一個英文course其實幾好玩，剪下片吹下水寫下blog，冇考試。
reviews.comment_teaching: 好好人，好肯答學生問題，email問佢一條10個字嘅問題佢可以比返200字意見你。上堂幾有趣，會講下自己啲真實經歷，而且講解asm啲要求個時好細心，直頭幫你做左一半咁，因為佢所以個course workload其實細左好多。
reviews.comment_workload: 比較大，唔明剪片點樣group project，預左自己一個人搞掂曬啲野，workload話佢超級大其實又唔係，但佢真係將啲狗屎垃圾deadline堆埋係最忙嘅時候（final前兩個禮拜），之後啲instructions又真係勁遲先出，想早少少趁得閒搞掂都唔得。

reviews.author: LostConnection
reviews.title: Waste my time
reviews.comment_content:
Focus on writing academic blogs and multimodal group project
The content in the lesson is basically useless.
Just let you know the format to help you finish the assignment.
They put many resources on canvas for us to read but the instructor never told us until we asked.

The most useful part of this course is APA citation
but they don't teach in class and ask you to join the LANG1003 library workshop in your spare time.
reviews.comment_teaching:
No teaching.
Most of the time in the breakout room to have a discussion.
Sometimes have feedback.
reviews.comment_workload:
Hefty workload

Lots of SDL and time-consuming Perusall
Some Elective is time-consuming
I recommend doing Elective 4 - Study Abroad Adventure
very interesting and easy to do
Also Elective 2
very easy

2 academic blogs are designed to help you do the project
but no instruction to help you do the blogs. Annoying

Multimodal project 6-8 mins video with a 1-2mins opening presentation and 3-4mins warp up and Q&A
Hell, you will need extra time to learn video editing.
Make the content nice and beautiful.
Don't forget the APA reference
I only feel PAIN

After the project
They ask you to do 3 reflection
300 words reflection x 2
1 in solo talk head video (3-4mins)
you have about 1 week to finish them
Just rush them and prepare your exam
Don't put so much reflection task and waste my time

At least 4 credit workload

reviews.author: keith ng
reviews.title: 3 cred course with 9 cred workload
reviews.comment_content: Boring and time idling. The topic is about multimodality but throughout the course I did not learn how to be multimodal.
reviews.comment_teaching: Keep mentioning that we have to be multimodal in this course but did not tell us how. Always said that we have done a great job in our tasks but then the score released is a disaster
reviews.comment_workload: There are overwhelming workloads. At first there are two academic blogs which u need to write about 400 words each. Then u have a multimodal project which needs u to make a video with 8 minutes long. More than that, there are blended lessons which the length of them are ridiculous( 1.5 hrs course ask you to attend blended lesson which needs 3 hours to finish). Furthermore, there are three reflection task at last which u have to write two writings with 300 words and a 4-5 mins talking head video which each of them is only 5% for the final score.

reviews.author: 欣欣
reviews.comment_content:
好充實 因為每堂都有野做 讀下d文章同做下group discussion咁 佔左20% course grade
10%係SDL分 elpa test 佔成40分 所以考得唔好 呢科死緊
reviews.comment_workload: 都幾大workload ge,因為每個lecture都有pre reading materials, self-directed learning assignment 基本上好多都係計分 最多可以走6次堂

reviews.author: Ene
reviews.comment_content: Just like 1002, they have homeworks, essays, discussions, etc.
reviews.comment_teaching: The teacher is nice, she gives many advice in the consulting section.
reviews.comment_grading: The ELPA test is a bit similar to IELTS, but it is very difficult if you don't recite the vocab list provided. Better to do the exercise provided on the website each week before exam.
reviews.comment_workload: Exclude the pre lesson exercises, the workload is fair. But the pre lesson exercises dos not take much time. Better to take it seriously because it also take part of the grades

reviews.author: ky1206
reviews.comment_content: Just as Lang1002, some essay writing, speaking.
reviews.comment_teaching: He is a chill local teacher, you can chat with him like friend. His accent is quite good so the lesson is comfortable. He is willing to answer questions after class though i have his classes on zoom, he replies all my email for even minor questions.
reviews.comment_grading: The grading is fair, if you do put effort on your assignment, easy to get B or above. I got average 5 to 6 sub-score in each of my assignments, finally got a B+.
reviews.comment_workload: I think the workload is fair, just make sure do not miss anyone of the assignments.

reviews.author: 真理平和完美
reviews.comment_content: OK! Just ordinary stuff. A little over-standardized. The choice of topics is really good! I think they must have done some research on this. However, the content is a bit inflexible.
reviews.comment_teaching: If you are of the same personality with her, then you are lucky, you can expect a good grade. If not, try to swap session. If you can not swap, then try to do everything as she says, and try to keep personal contact with her to the minimum, in order not to have conflict with her, and to have a safe grade.
reviews.comment_grading: This depends on the similarity between personalities of students and the instructor.
reviews.comment_workload: OK! The workload is at an average level. Try to pay more effort and obey her orders.

reviews.author: YOqwqeeweqw
reviews.title: 需要剪片, you need to make video
reviews.comment_content:
老實說, 我不是很清楚教啲咩。老師教一些 寫作技巧/叫我地去做網上練習, 但最後咩都學不到, 有少少覺得浪費時間。

1003i 有一個團體功課，佔分極重。
主要內容是 老師叫你地3-4人一組 並叫你們選一條社會問題,之後一起造一條5-6分鐘影片去介紹問題，並提供解決辦法。當中汲及說話技巧,剪片技巧 和內容

內容:
1.有冇做足資料搜集
2.(問題)和(解決辨法) 兩大部份所佔的時間是否合理
3. 解決辨法是否具創意

說話技巧:
1. 整體順暢度
2. 每個組員的說話時間是否平均分配
3. 聲線有冇高低起伏
4. 用字的深淺度(根據題目所比的觀眾, 例如條片是給一般觀眾看, 啲英文字要簡單D, 相反, 給教授看, 可以用一些專業字句。)

剪片技巧:
1. 有冇根據內容而加一些相關圖片/影片,令內容表達更清晰
2. 有冇加一些音效/音樂去吸引觀眾

To be honest, I don't know what did I learn in this course. Lecturer just taught us some writing skills and then told us to do online homework and exercise, which wasted my time, I think.

There is a group project that really matters in this course because it nearly can decide your grade.
The group project is making a video, 3-4 people per group. Each group needs to choose a social issue and then make a video to introduce problem and give solution. The score of your group video mainly depends on speaking skills, video editing skills and content.

Content;
1. Whether you do research enough.
2. The time used to mention problem and solution
3. The creativity/innovation of solution

Speaking skills:
1. The fluency
2. The division of each member speaking time
3. Change in volume of voice
4. Vocab( depending on audience. If the audience is general public, common/easy words should be used. In the contrast, if your video is for professors, some specific/difficult vocabs can be  used.)

Video Editing Skills:
1. Whether add photos/ video to represent your point more clearly
2. Whether put music/sound effect to draw attention
reviews.comment_teaching:
教學內容很混亂及抽像
同埋我不太喜歡網課，始中參與始度低。

Bruce Ma 都用心教，幾乎每堂都超時，佢有時都會主動叫學生答問題, 確保學生真的明。此外，佢自己間中都會傳電郵去補充課堂內容, 睇得出佢用心教。

但是 佢有時會在臨交功課前一日才通知 功課某些要求改左。己經做曬的我被迫要花額外的時間去重做。

Everything is abstract and not organized. Also, I do not like online lesson because of less engagement.

I think Bruce Ma is willing to pay time and effort and nearly all of his every lesson were overran. Sometimes he told student to answer questions, in order to make sure that students can understand. Moreover, he often sent email to provide additional information, which shows he took our study seriously.

However, sometimes he informed us" some requirements of homework were changed" so late. For example, the deadline is 5/5 and he just told us on 4/5. Therefore, I was forced to redo homework.
reviews.comment_grading:
評分準則:
除了Group Project, 其餘功課評分非常混亂，完全不知點拎高分。

老師:
Bruce MA 其實都不差。就算不知如何拎高分，我覺得你只要肯跟Bruce Ma 給你的範例做，都起碼有B。

Grading Scheme:
Except Group project, the scheme mentioning other homework is a mess, I do not know how to get high marks.

Lecturer:
I think Bruce MA is not a killer. If you follow the sample Bruce Ma gives, you can at least get B.
reviews.comment_workload:
好睇你和組員想扲咩等級

剪片方面
如果要加 圖片/影片音效，要花時間係YouTube/其他網頁揾。另外，亦要花不少時間去剪片, 例如 聲音同畫面要同步，轉折位。之後萬一隊員不滿意，到時又要花時間重改。

當然，如果成條片不加特效，確實不要花咁多時間 但相對分數會較低。

內容方面:
就取決於你搵資料嗰陣時肯不肯睇曬成篇文 然後再判斷它合唔合適。老實講，是幾浪費時間。

其次，我覺得是乎運氣。你咁啱找到 高質, 同你題目有關的資料，咁咪恭喜你。找不到就要花額外時間去找 而且未必找到。

It depends on what grade your group want to aim

Regarding video editing:
If you want to put video/sound effect, you have to spend some time searching on YouTube or other websites. Plus, you have to edit the video, like making sound sync with video and make a turning point. After that, if one of your teammates does not satisfy with the video, you need to do it again, which costs your extra time.

Of course you can choose not to add any effect, which saves lots of time but I am afraid that your grade will be lower.

Content:
I think it depends on whether you are willing to read the article carefully and then judge whether it can be the source. To be honest, it really costs time and patience.

Moreover, I think luck is also a factor. If you can find the source that is reliable and relative to your topic on the first page of search engine, then congratulation! Otherwise, you need to pay a long period of time on searching source and it is not guaranteed that you can find it.

reviews.author: YYT
reviews.comment_content: Good in general. How long do I need to write to submit this review? How long do I need to write to submit this review? How long do I need to write to submit this review?
reviews.comment_teaching: A little bit boring but acceptable. How long do I need to write to submit this review? How long do I need to write to submit this review?
reviews.comment_grading: Satisfying especially when you're in an A class.
reviews.comment_workload: Little workload for me. Don't have to pay extra effort after class besides writing the required essay.
